title: US intelligence thinks Putin feels misled by his own military after repeated failures during Ukraine invasion
content:
1. US intelligence thinks Putin feels misled by his own military after repeated failures during Ukraine invasion  The Independent
  2. UK spy chief: Russian soldiers are refusing to carry out orders in Ukraine  Yahoo News
  3. US intel believes Putin is being misinformed by advisers  CNN
  4. White House: Intel shows Putin misled by advisers on Ukraine  WGN News
  5. Russian soldiers refusing to carry out orders and accidentally shot down own aircraft, claims UK spy chief  The Independent
contentSnippet:
US intelligence thinks Putin feels misled by his own military after repeated failures during Ukraine invasion  The Independent
UK spy chief: Russian soldiers are refusing to carry out orders in Ukraine  Yahoo News
US intel believes Putin is being misinformed by advisers  CNN
White House: Intel shows Putin misled by advisers on Ukraine  WGN News
Russian soldiers refusing to carry out orders and accidentally shot down own aircraft, claims UK spy chief  The Independent

localize.title: ウクライナ侵攻で失敗を繰り返したプーチンは自軍に惑わされたと感じていると米情報機関は考えている。
